workingSpaceVaribles(variable_dict)

utils.rawtiff(path, channels)[source]¶

get names of tiff videos from given path. Last character of filename is channel.

Parameters

  • path (str) – a directory containing tiff images

  • channels – [‘G’] for reading green channel only, [‘G’,’R’] for reading both green and red channels

Returns

if channels=[‘G’,’R’], returns {‘G’:nameG, ‘R’:nameR}. if channels=[‘G’], returns nameG.

utils.randompxl(outlinexy, n=10)[source]¶

select n random pixels from binary mask outlinexy

Returns

list of pixels [[x0,y0],[x1,y1],…]

utils.crop(img, cnt)[source]¶

find min area bounding box of opencv contour and crop the rotated box

utils.binary_segments(y, onlytrue=False)[source]¶

divide 1D binary array into segments

Returns

list of list. Segments are measured from left to right. Every inner list has 3 elements: [value(True or False), starting index, length]
